item.title: Recommendation Machines - The Magic behind Amazon telling us what to buy
item.description: Recommendation Machines Have you ever wondered how Amazon, Netflix and Co. are able to tell which products you should buy or which movies you should like? They are surprisingly precise and it is all due to the magic of recommentaion algorithms.
